programme.title: NFL Game Re-Airs
programme.desc: Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa, who moved to 7-0 in his career against the New England Patriots after this contest, entered the game with a league-high 73.4% completion rate and went 29 for 40.

programme.desc: Barry Sanders was rewarded Thanksgiving MVP by John Madden for his 167 yards and a season-high three rushing TDs performance in a 55-20 win over the Bears.

programme.title: NFL Film Session
programme.desc: Coach Steve Spagnuolo, the architect of the 2007 Giants Super Bowl defense, breaks down defensive coverages with Ron Jaworski and Brian Baldinger. Find out the key differences between a cover 2, cover 3, and cover 4 zone.

programme.title: NFL Film Session
programme.desc: How does a player go from undrafted to the Pro Bowl? Wide receiver Doug Baldwin shows Brian Baldinger how he's utilized a killer crossover and keen mind to become one of the NFL's most reliable pass-catchers.
